Package weka.classifiers.trees.m5

Class YongSplitInfo

java.lang.Object
weka.classifiers.trees.m5.YongSplitInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, SplitEvaluate, RevisionHandler
public final class YongSplitInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable, SplitEvaluate, RevisionHandler
Stores split information.
Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Yong Wang (yongwang@cs.waikato.ac.nz), Mark Hall (mhall@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
